channel.title: Services on Approprio
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Approprio

item.title: Equipment Design & Build
item.description: We design and build custom equipment that helps you work better. Past Work A Big Custom Jackstand A Faster Corn Sheller

item.title: Product Design
item.description: Do you have a vague product idea and need to get it fleshed out? We can help design it using modern CAD software and analysis tools.

item.title: Repair and Upgrade
item.description: You broke a critical part of your machine, and they don’t make it anymore? Or you’re tired of it continuing to break? We can help make a replacement or upgrade. Past Work A New Tiller Handle
